title: Piper Cherokee
description: Complete Checklist for Piper PA-28 Cherokee

listItems.response: Check for airworthiness certificate, registration, operating handbook
CHECK for damage and freedom of movement

listItems.challenge: WARNING: Ensure all covers and tie-downs are removed before proceeding
NOTE: In cold weather, additional priming may be necessary

listItems.response: CHECK (RPM drop less than 175, difference less than 50)
CHECK (reduce to idle, then back to 1000 RPM)
ALT or as directed by ATC
LEAN for best economy or performance
CHECK BOTH (then START if engine stops)
